titleStmt.title: Mormonostolismos, sive Lamiarum vestitus A poem on the King and Queen of Fairy. Translated into Latine, by Mr. Walter Dennestone.
titleStmt.author: Steward, Simeon, Sir.
Denniston, Walter.

notesStmt.note: The first word of title is in Greek characters.
In English and Latin verse, on facing pages.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
